LocaleResource.Value: Meta keywords to be added to category page header.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Meta description to be added to category page header.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Override the page title. The default is the name of the category.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set a search engine friendly page name e.g. 'The Best Computers' to make your page name '##-the-best-computers.aspx' (## represents the category ID). The default is the name of category.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select a parent category for this category. Leave this field empty to make this the root level category

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the page size for products in this category e.g. '4' products per page.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Define the price ranges for the store price range filter. Separate ranges with a semicolon e.g. '0-199;200-300;301-;' (301- means 301 and over)

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check if you want to show a category on home page.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to publish this category (visible in store). Uncheck to unpublish (category not available in store).

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the category's display order. 1 represents the top of the list.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: A short description of the product. This is the text that displays in product lists i.e. category / manufacturer pages

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: A full description of the product.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to display this product on your store's home page. Recommended for your most popular products.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Meta keywords to be added to product page header

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Meta description to be added to product page header

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Override the page title. The default is the name of the product.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set a search engine friendly page name e.g. 'The Best Product' to make your page name '##\the-best-product' (## represents the product ID). The default is the name of the product.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to allow customers to review this product.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to allow customers to rate this product.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to publish this product (visible in store). Uncheck to unpublish (product not available in store).

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the from address for all outgoing emails from your store e.g. 'sales@yourstore.com'.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the friendly display name for outgoing emails from your store e.g. 'Your Store Sales Department'.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the host name or IP address of your mail server. You can normally find this out from your ISP or web host.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the SMTP port of your mail server. This is usually port 25.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the username you use to authenticate to your mail server.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This is the password you use to authenticate to your mail server

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to use Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) to encrypt the SMTP connection.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to use default credentials for the connection

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The flag image file name. The image should be saved into \\images\\flags\\ directory.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether this language is published and can therefore be selected by visitors to your store.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The display order of this language. 1 represents the top of the list.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The exchange rate against the primary exchange rate currency.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether the currency is published.

LocaleResource.Name: Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The display order of this currency. 1 represents the top of the list.
